troparion: (Tone 4) We are weak and broken by sin;* heal our infirmities, O Lord.* You are the Physician of our souls,* and You know the heart of each of us.
prokimenon: Praise the God of my life.
I will say to God: You are my rock.
Like the deer that yearns for running streams.
second_prokimenon: Defend me, O God, and plead my cause.
